website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight and durable espresso maker that can brew up a cup in two minutes without you having to break a sweat.
pros: Powered by a rechargeable lithium battery
Comes with a USB charging cable
Comes with a measuring scoop, cup, filter basket, and manual
Brews an espresso in under two minutes
Most found this to be a very durable option
cons: Some reports of this espresso maker leaking or breaking fairly quickly

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioning!!! This is my fifth device and ...
customer_reviews.text: Malfunctioning!!! This is my fifth device and i need to claim for insurance. First one did work, second one worked for week or two, third one battery didn’t stop(i was scared-no way to turn this off manually. Gotta wait til battery dies) fourth one, didn’t work, last one, worked for couple of weeks and no dripping. I was very patient and hope for this device but it is not READY.

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces from box
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in box that did not look new. Clearly this was a used item because the plug for the charger is missing. Unfortunately I only noticed this today, over a month after I made my purchase (past return date), for a birthday gift, which is tomorrow. I guess I'll find out whether a different charger plug will work. I'm very embarrassed to be giving this gift now. I will not be recommending this product, despite whether it works well or not.

customer_reviews.title: Love this Espresso Maker
customer_reviews.text: The Pressopump makes at home espresso making quick and easy. The entire process takes only minutes. And cleanup is a breeze. The Pressopump is capable of making one espresso after another, without any down time or difference in taste for the first press. I've also found it holds it's charge for a long period of time. Best of all, it's portable, so I can have fresh brewed espresso wherever I go.
